name: Marid
proficiencies: Saving Throw: DEX +5 | Saving Throw: WIS +7, CHA +8
senses: Blindsight 30 ft. | Darkvision 120 ft., Passive Perception 13

special_abilities.name: Amphibious.
special_abilities.desc: The marid can breathe air and water.

special_abilities.name: Elemental Demise.
special_abilities.desc: If the marid dies, its body disintegrates into a burst of water and foam, leaving behind only equipment the marid was wearing or carrying.

special_abilities.name: Innate Spellcasting.
special_abilities.desc: The maridâ€™s innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 16, +8 to hit with spell attacks). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

actions.name: Multiattack.
actions.desc: The marid makes two trident attacks.

actions.name: Trident.
actions.desc: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d6 + 6) piercing damage, or 15 (2d8 + 6) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

actions.name: Water Jet.
actions.desc: The marid magically shoots water in a 60-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a DC 16 Dexterity saving throw. On a failure, a target takes 21 (6d6) bludgeoning damage and, if it is Huge or smaller, is pushed up to 20 feet away from the marid and knocked prone. On a success, a target takes half the bludgeoning damage, but is neither pushed nor knocked prone.
